descriptionHtml:
Adds an abandoned caravan outside of Whiterun near the Khajiit camp.  

Features:
• bedroll
• fast travel map marker
• 2 chests on each side of the cart
• 1 hidden safe underneath the cart
• all containers will not respawn (safe to store your loot)
• wood cutting block
• smithing anvil
• tanning rack
• cooking pot
• combined alchemy/enchanting table (saves space!)
• weapon rack at cart entrance (unsure if weapons put there will stay, long term use at your own risk!)
• DOMESTIC GOAT

As always, backup your saves before trying a new mod.  I can\'t promise everything is working perfectly.  If there are any problems leave a comment and I will address it.

Update 1.1:
added some junk in the tent, made it look less empty
hopefully fixed some navmesh issues


View the Rusty Antler Caravan here!
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14414
View the Gleaming Salvage Caravan here!
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14444
View the Netch Fetcher Convoy here!
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14776

Note: As soon as I work a few things out, I will be merging all caravans into one .esp file.  Keep a look out for when that happens because I will be taking these down and moving them over to that page.
author: x39363440845
